text: Obadja Iihuhua (born Ombalantu, Ovamboland, Namibia) was one of the first seven Ovambo pastors, whom the director of the Finnish Missionary Society, Matti Tarkkanen ordained into priesthood in Oniipa, Ovamboland, on 27 September 1925, with a permission granted by the Bishop of Tampere, Jaakko Gummerus. His brother Sakeus Iihuhua was also ordained at the same time.Peltola 1958, p. 212. ==References== ==Sources== * Category:Namibian Lutheran clergy Category:Finnish Evangelical Lutheran Mission
title: Obadja Iihuhua
